location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 94: John Griffith and Samuel Manesty, Residents at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter John Griffith and Samuel Manesty inform Edward Galley that the ScorpionSnow is returning to Bushire, on her way to the Presidency, with Griffith on board. Galley is informed that Manesty has been placed in charge of the Company's factory at Bussora [Basra].
